defs.def: n. 肖像，画像

sent.orig: The portrait was his proudest possession.
sent.trans: 那肖像是他最为珍贵的东西。

defs.def: n. 物质，实质，内容，重要性，财产

sent.orig: The emery is a hard metallic substance.
sent.trans: 金刚砂是非常坚硬的金属物质。

defs.def: n. 电路，线路，电路元件，电路学

sent.orig: An interface unit or circuitry that converts data to and from the representation used by a particular peripheral device or class of peripheral devices; for example, a device that converts between bit serial and bit parallel and resolves differences in transmission speeds.
sent.trans: 一种接口部件或电路，用来把数据转换成某种特殊的外围设备上的表示或某类外围设备上的表示或把此种表示转换成数据。例如，一台在串行位和并行位之间作转换且解决传输速度差别的设备。

defs.def: vi. 刺痛，激动 n. 刺痛，激动

sent.orig: His cheek tingle from the slap she have give him.
sent.trans: 他的面颊因挨了她一记耳光而感到刺痛。

defs.def: n. 处罚，惩罚

sent.orig: He kicked a penalty goal in the football match.
sent.trans: 在这场足球赛中，他主罚，踢进了一个球。

defs.def: adj. 讨厌的，烦人的

sent.orig: A pesky mosquito.
sent.trans: 讨厌的蚊子

defs.def: adj. 次等的，较低的，不如的

sent.orig: A cheaper camera is not always inferior to a more expensive one.
sent.trans: 廉价照相机的质量并总不比昂贵的差。

defs.def: v. 撕成碎片，变成碎片 n. 碎布条，细片，些少

sent.orig: A hanging end or shred.
sent.trans: 挂着的末梢，挂着的布条

defs.def: v. (使)过滤，(使)渗透 n. 渗出液

sent.orig: I'll percolate some coffee for you.
sent.trans: 我给你滤煮一些咖啡。

defs.def: n. 苦差事，苦工

sent.orig: I am afraid that I shall find it drudgery to teach music to beginner.
sent.trans: 我恐怕会觉得教初学者音乐是个单调沉闷的工作。

defs.def: n. 永远，来世，不朽

sent.orig: The dull play seemed to last an eternity.
sent.trans: 这场乏味的剧似乎演个没完没了。

defs.def: n. 新奇，新奇的事物，小装饰

sent.orig: Showoffs never miss an opportunity to draw attention to themselves by some outrageous novelty.
sent.trans: 爱显示自己的人遇事总喜欢标新立异。

defs.def: n. 输送机，运送者，交付者 =conveyer

sent.orig: A mechanism, often with buckets or scoops attached to a conveyor, used for hoisting materials.
sent.trans: 吊车一种通常配有联接在传送带上的吊桶或戽斗，用来举起材料

defs.def: adj. 繁茂的，丰富的，充满活力的

sent.orig: An exuberant, nippy puppy.
sent.trans: 一只精力旺盛，爱咬人的小狗

defs.def: n. 重新制定，再次扮演
n. 陈腔滥调

sent.orig: Cliche is a feature of bad journalism.
sent.trans: 使用套语是拙劣的新闻体的特点。

defs.def: n. 等级制度，层级[计]，统治集团

sent.orig: One who occupies a position of authority in a religious hierarchy.
sent.trans: 祭祀长，高僧，大主教掌握高级职位或有权威的宗教领袖

defs.def: adj. 足够的，充分的

sent.orig: Desertion is a ground (ie legally sufficient reason) for divorce.
sent.trans: 被配偶遗弃是离婚的充足理由。

defs.def: n. 目的，意图，决心，议题 vt. 打算，决意

sent.orig: She seems to do these things on purpose.
sent.trans: 她似乎是有意地做这些事。

defs.def: n. 备忘录

sent.orig: Keep this exchange memo for reconversion into foreign currency.
sent.trans: 保存好这张兑换水单以便兑换回外币。

defs.def: n. 陷阱，隐患

sent.orig: The road to the conquest of cancer is long and full of pitfall.
sent.trans: 战胜癌症的征途是漫长的，而且布满意想不到的困难。

defs.def: n. 疯子，热衷者 adj. 疯狂的 =maniacal

sent.orig: A maniac had gouged several holes in the priceless painting.
sent.trans: 有个狂徒在那幅价值连城的画上乱凿了几个洞。

defs.def: v. 切断，脱离，分开

sent.orig: His arm was severed from his body in the accident.
sent.trans: 在那次意外中，他的手臂被切断了。

defs.def: n. 意识，知觉，自觉，觉悟

sent.orig: In his sleepy state, the sound of a car driving up to the house scarcely impinged on his consciousness.
sent.trans: 他困得那副样子，连汽车朝那房子开去时发出的声音都没能使他清醒。

defs.def: n. 要塞，堡垒，中心地

sent.orig: A fortified place, especially a large, permanent military stronghold that often includes a town.
sent.trans: 要塞构筑了堡垒的地方，尤指大的、永久性的军事驻地，常包括一个城镇

defs.def: adj. 异种的，异质的，由不同成份形成的 [计算机] 非均匀的

sent.orig: Made up of loosely cemented heterogeneous material.
sent.trans: 成团的由不同特质经松散粘和而成的

defs.def: adj. 已废弃的，过时的

sent.orig: The typewriter is obsolete.
sent.trans: 这架打字机老掉牙了。

defs.def: n. 不可知论者 adj. 不可知论的，不可知论者的

sent.orig: I am an agnostic; I do not pretend to know what many ignorant men are sure of.
sent.trans: 我是个不可知论者; 我不假装知道许多无知的人以为知道的一清二楚的东西。

defs.def: n. 无政府主义者

sent.orig: Extremes meet. the most furious anarchist become the most barefaced apostate.
sent.trans: 两极相通。最激烈的无政府主义者，居然成了最露骨的变节者。

defs.def: v. 猛冲，猛掷，泼溅 n. 猛冲，破折号，冲，短跑

sent.orig: She dashed off a letter to her mother.
sent.trans: 她给母亲匆匆写了一封信。

defs.def: v. 使 ... 悲伤

sent.orig: It's no use grieving about past errors.
sent.trans: 为过去的错误懊悔不已是无济于事的。

defs.def: n. 否认，拒绝

sent.orig: An opinion or a doctrine at variance with established religious beliefs, especially dissension from or denial of Roman Catholic dogma by a professed believer or baptized church member.
sent.trans: 异端学说与已得到承认的宗教信仰相矛盾的观点或学说，尤指已立誓信教或受过洗礼的教徒对罗马天主教教义的异议或否认

defs.def: n. 交易，契约，便宜货 v. 议价，讨价还价，(谈价钱后)卖

sent.orig: The exam was more difficult than I had bargained for.
sent.trans: 这次考试之难出乎我的意料之外。

defs.def: n. 接受（礼物、邀请、建议等），同意，认可，承兑

sent.orig: Therewas an undercurrent of resentment in their acceptance of the plan.
sent.trans: 他们接受该计画时心怀不满。

defs.def: v. 减轻，救济，解除

sent.orig: The Government acted quickly to relieve the widespread distress caused by the earthquake.
sent.trans: 地震造成广泛地区的灾难，政府迅速采取行动赈济灾民。

defs.def: n. 悲痛，忧伤

sent.orig: She uttered a wail of grief.
sent.trans: 她悲痛地大声尖叫。

defs.def: n. 后退的马，踌躇不前的人
v. 使大吃一惊

sent.orig: He was flabbergasted when he heard that his friend had been accused of murder.
sent.trans: 他听说朋友被控谋杀罪，大吃一惊。

defs.def: vt. 轻视

sent.orig: He claims to despise riches.
sent.trans: 他宣称蔑视钱财。

defs.def: n. 谋反，叛乱，反抗

sent.orig: The rebellion was quickly quashed.
sent.trans: 叛乱被迅速平息。

defs.def: adj. 连续的

sent.orig: Any consecutive set of descriptive clauses terminated by a period, written in the identification, environment, or procedure divisions of a COBOL program.
sent.trans: COBOL源程序中在标识部、环境部或过程部中所书写的，用句号结尾的一组连贯的描述子句。

defs.def: n. 顺从，遵从，灵活

sent.orig: In computer security, the independent review and examination of system records and activities in order to test for adequacy of system controls, to ensure compliance with established policy and operational procedures, and to recommend any indicated changes in controls, policy or procedures.
sent.trans: 在计算机安全中，为测试计算机控制的正确性，为确保按照既定政策和操作步骤执行，为提供在控制政策和步骤中的任何指定的变化而对系统的记录和活动进行的独立的审核和检查。

defs.def: n. 审计，查帐 vt. 审计，旁听

sent.orig: Don't let that firm handle your auditing; they made a complete balls-up of ours.
sent.trans: 不要让那家公司来处理你的帐目，他们把我们的帐弄得一塌糊涂。

defs.def: n. 调和，和解

sent.orig: A mutual clarification of misunderstandings; a reconciliation.
sent.trans: 和解为消除误解而进行的相互说明; 和解

defs.def: adj. 年长的，高级的，资深的，地位较高的 n. 年长者，长辈，上司，大四学生

sent.orig: She was unfit for such a senior position.
sent.trans: 她不能胜任这样的高级职位。

defs.def: adj. 年少的，下级的，资历较浅的 n. 年少者，晚辈，地位较低者，三年级生

sent.orig: I do wish he wouldn't condescend to the junior staff in his department.
sent.trans: 我但愿他不要假惺惺地纡尊降贵接近部门里的低级员工。

defs.def: n. 大学一年级学生，新手

sent.orig: The appearance of the new freshman called away his attention.
sent.trans: 新同学的出现使他的注意力分散了。

defs.def: n. 大学二年级生 adj. 第二年的

sent.orig: Lily is a Sophomore now.
sent.trans: 莉莉现在大学二年级。

defs.def: n. 熟练，精通

sent.orig: Any of12 levels of proficiency at the grade of black belt in martial arts such as judo and karate.
sent.trans: 段在东方武术中，黑腰带的级别精通达12级中的任一级，如柔道和空手道

defs.def: adj. 奇怪的，古怪的，特殊的，独特的 n. 特权

sent.orig: There was this peculiar man sitting opposite me in the train.
sent.trans: 在火车上有个挺特别的男人坐在我对面。

defs.def: n. 住处，住宅，居住

sent.orig: Residence in the area qualifies you for membership.
sent.trans: 只要在本区居住就可入会。

defs.def: n. 估价，评价

sent.orig: The evaluation is unfair.
sent.trans: 这种评估是不公平的。

defs.def: n. 药房，药剂学

sent.orig: Readily available in pharmacies; not requiring special preparation.
sent.trans: 药房常备的不需特殊准备的; 药房常预备的

defs.def: n. 口角者，争论者，牛仔
adj. 民族的，种族的，有民族特色的 n. 少数民族的一员

sent.orig: The bringing of people of different racial or ethnic groups into unrestricted and equal association, as in society or an organization; desegregation.
sent.trans: 种族或宗教融合在社会或组织中，使不同的种族或宗教派别的人处于无限制的平等的关系中; 取消种族隔离

defs.def: n. 超现实主义者

sent.orig: The lexicon of surrealist art.
sent.trans: 超现实主义艺术的词汇

defs.def: vt. 示范，演示，证明 vi. 示威

sent.orig: She demonstrated that 2 and 2 are four.
sent.trans: 她证明2加2等于四。

defs.def: n. （单复同）物种，种类

sent.orig: This species has reached a higher plane of development.
sent.trans: 这一种属已达到更高的发展阶段。

defs.def: vt. 显示，透露 n. (外墙与门或窗之间的)窗侧，门侧 n. (汽车的)窗框

sent.orig: Government employees swear an oath not to reveal official secrets.
sent.trans: 政府雇员宣誓不泄露官方机密。

defs.def: adv. 深深地，深刻地

sent.orig: The news moved her profoundly. She immediately asked to go to the front.
sent.trans: 这消息使她深受感动，她立即要求到前线去。

defs.def: n. 冒险，危险，危害 vt. 冒险，赌运气

sent.orig: Explosions, though infrequent, are an occupational hazard for coal-miners.
sent.trans: 矿井爆炸虽然不常发生，但却是煤矿工人职业中的危险。

defs.def: adj. 无底的，无限的，深不可测的

sent.orig: Law is a bottomless pit.
sent.trans: 法律是无底的深渊。

defs.def: n. 叙述，故事 adj. 叙事的，故事体的

sent.orig: The lines form a prelude to his long narrative poem.
sent.trans: 这几行诗是他那长篇叙事诗的序诗。

defs.def: n. 紧握，了解，手柄，手提包 vt. 紧抓，吸引

sent.orig: The eagle seized its prey in a tenacious grip.
sent.trans: 鹰将捕获物紧紧抓住。

defs.def: n. 多数，大多数，多数党，多数派

sent.orig: She reaches her majority next month.
sent.trans: 她下个月就到成年年龄了。

defs.def: n. (材料等的)结构，特点，表面，基本结构 vt. 给予结构

sent.orig: Beat the mixture until it has a light, puffy texture.
sent.trans: 把混合料搅拌到发起来为止。

defs.def: n. 遗憾，后悔，抱歉 v. 为 ... 感到遗憾，后悔，惋惜

sent.orig: We regret that we are unable to reconsider your case.
sent.trans: 我们很遗憾无法再考虑你的情况。

defs.def: n. 复杂，复杂性，复杂的事物

sent.orig: My brain swam at the complexity of the calculations.
sent.trans: 这种复杂的计算搞得我头昏眼花。

defs.def: vt. 精炼，净化，使优雅 vi. 被提纯，改进

sent.orig: The author is planning to refine on his work of five years ago.
sent.trans: 作者打算把他5年前的著作修改得更完美些。

defs.def: 小故障，小失误
n. 军火，弹药 弹药 军火，军需品 [喻]攻击[防御]手段 投掷[射击]物

sent.orig: They went on firing until they had spent all their ammunition.
sent.trans: 他们不停地射击，耗尽了所有的弹药。

defs.def: n. 幻觉，错觉，错误的信仰(或观念)

sent.orig: A mirage is an optical illusion.
sent.trans: 海市蜃楼是一种视错觉。

defs.def: n. 联合，合伙，国际财团

sent.orig: A consortium of construction companies will build the power-station.
sent.trans: 由建筑公司组成的集团将建造该发电站。

defs.def: adv. 明白地，明确地

sent.orig: The definition of a global symbol that is not explicitly available for reference by modules linked with the module in which the definition occurs.
sent.trans: 一种全局符号定义，它不能被与定义该全局符号的模块相链接的其它模块直接引用。

defs.def: adj. 可磋商的，可转让的，可通行的

sent.orig: He says his claim is not negotiable.
sent.trans: 他说他的要求是不容讨价还价的。

defs.def: n. 目录(指数，符号，指示器，参见号), index的复数。

sent.orig: The financial times share index go up five point yesterday.
sent.trans: 《金融时报》的股票指数昨天上升了五点。

defs.def: vt. 分配，指派，指定 n. 受让人

sent.orig: It is impossible to assign an exact date to this building.
sent.trans: 确定这座建筑物的确切年代是不可能的。

defs.def: n. 赎回，赎罪，救赎，补偿

sent.orig: He had finished the redemption of his promises.
sent.trans: 他已经履行完他的诺言了。

defs.def: v. 打盹儿，懒散着打发掉日子 n. 打盹儿

sent.orig: Dad is taking a snooze in the other room.
sent.trans: 爸爸正在另外一间房间里打盹儿。

defs.def: v. 欺骗，哄骗，愚弄 n. 愚弄人，恶作剧

sent.orig: Something intended to deceive; a hoax or fraud.
sent.trans: 瞒骗，欺诈用于骗人的东西; 骗局或欺诈

defs.def: n. 速记，缩写

sent.orig: He took down the minute in shorthand.
sent.trans: 他将会议记录速记下来。

defs.def: adj. 易腐烂的，会枯萎的，会死的 （复数）perishables:易腐烂的东西（尤指食物）

sent.orig: Keep perishable foods under refrigeration.
sent.trans: 把容易变质的食物冷藏起来。

defs.def: n. 形态学，语形论，形态论
adj. 显著的，异常的，非凡的，值得注意的

sent.orig: The doctors had given her up but she made a remarkable recovery.
sent.trans: 医生们已放弃了治愈她的希望，而她却恢复得很好。

defs.def: n. 五边形 Pentagon:五角大楼（美国国防部）

sent.orig: But the judge had no stomach for bureaucratic infighting(particularly with the Pentagon, which controls most of his intelligence budget plus its own) and not much feel for how to fit secret information into policy debates.
sent.trans: 可是法官无意参与政府内斗(尤其不愿与国防部内斗。国防部控制自己的预算，也控制着他的大部分情报预算), 同时他也不甚清楚如何把机密情报扯进政策辩论。

defs.def: n. 启示，天启
n. 意向，精神状态 心态
adj. 杂技的

sent.orig: A short horizontal bar suspended from two parallel ropes, used for exercises or for acrobatic stunts.
sent.trans: 吊架一根从两根平行的绳子悬挂下来的水平的短棍，用于体育锻炼或杂技表演

defs.def: vt. 代表，使具体化，包含，使(精神)肉体化

sent.orig: The country's constitution embodies the ideals of freedom and equality.
sent.trans: 这个国家的宪法体现了自由和平等的理想。

defs.def: n. 效率，功率

sent.orig: We were most impressed with/by your efficiency.
sent.trans: 你的工作效率很高，我们极为钦佩。

defs.def: n. 演习，调遣，策略 vt. 调遣，演习，巧妙地操纵 vi. 调遣，演习，用计策

sent.orig: A maneuver in which an enemy force is attacked from two flanks and the front.
sent.trans: 钳形运动军事行动中，敌方部队受来至两翼及前方的攻击的战略

defs.def: n. 训练，纪律，惩罚，学科 vt. 训练，惩罚

sent.orig: The children are happy at the school, but they lack discipline.
sent.trans: 孩子们在学校里很快活，但很散漫。

defs.def: vt. 强调，着重

sent.orig: He banged his fist on the table to emphasize his argument.
sent.trans: 他用拳头敲著桌子为自己的辩驳助威。

defs.def: adj. 美学的，审美的，有美感的 n. (复数)审美观

sent.orig: The play was an aesthetic success.
sent.trans: 这部戏剧是个艺术上的成功

defs.def: n. 长期追求的目标 Grail:（传说中耶稣在最后的晚餐中用过的）圣杯
n. 倾向，意愿，倾斜度

sent.orig: I have little inclination to listen to you all evening.
sent.trans: 我可不愿意一晚上都听你说话。

defs.def: adj. 势不可挡的，压倒的

sent.orig: A sweetened offer for Harcourt by General Cinema appears to have a good chance of success, analysts said, and should give the troubled publisher a new lease on life by freeing its basically sound businesses from the burden of overwhelming debt.
sent.trans: 分析家说，通过影艺公司向哈考特提出的优厚条件似乎颇有成功的希望，并应可解除这家困难重重的出版商的庞大债务负荷，而使基本上健全的营业得到生机。

defs.def: vt. 倾听(给予注意)
vt. 解除武装，废除军备
n. 收获，年代(葡萄，葡萄酒);制造年代;一组具有共同特征的人或事情 adj. 佳酿的，古典的，优质的

sent.orig: He has some rare old vintage in his collection of wine.
sent.trans: 在他的酒类收藏中有一些名贵的陈年葡萄酒。

defs.def: n. 存在，实体

sent.orig: Being a single entity, unit, object, or living being; not two or more.
sent.trans: 一个的，单一的是一个实体、单元、物体或生物的; 而不是两个或者更多

defs.def: n. 编译，编辑

sent.orig: Her latest album is a compilation of all her best singles.
sent.trans: 她最新的一套唱片是她的最佳单曲唱片的汇集。

defs.def: n. 赎回，赎罪，救赎，补偿

sent.orig: He had finished the redemption of his promises.
sent.trans: 他已经履行完他的诺言了。

defs.def: n. 配额，限额，最低票数

sent.orig: We are still a little shy of our quota.
sent.trans: 我们离完成定额还差一点点。

defs.def: v. 解开 ... 的皮带，解除 ... 的束缚，解放

sent.orig: He unleashed a thunderbolt by announcinghis resignation.
sent.trans: 他宣布辞职好似晴天炸雷一般。

defs.def: n. 新信徒，新手

sent.orig: He is a novice at swimming.
sent.trans: 他是一个游泳新手。

defs.def: n. 杂货店 （复）groceries：食品杂货

sent.orig: A delivery van has brought the grocery order.
sent.trans: 送货车已把定购的杂货送来了。

defs.def: adj. 可再度使用的，可多次使用的

sent.orig: Object repository support for creating shared, reusable form and data module.
sent.trans: 用于创建共享、可重用窗体和数据模块的对象储存库支持。

defs.def: n. 设施，设备 n. 灵巧，容易，熟练

sent.orig: A clinic, hospital, or health care facility that treats various types of diseases and injuries.
sent.trans: 综合性医院，多科联合诊所治疗各种类型的疾病和创伤的诊所、医院或保健设施

defs.def: v. 决定，决心，确定，测定

sent.orig: The exam results could determine your career.
sent.trans: 考试成绩可能会决定你的前途。

defs.def: n. 腐败，堕落，贪污

sent.orig: Their actions reek of corruption.
sent.trans: 他们的举动显然有贪污之嫌。

defs.def: n. 束铁(柴捆), 同性恋 vt 打捆
vt. 淹死，沉浸于， vi. 淹死

sent.orig: It is cruel to drown the cat in the river.
sent.trans: 把猫淹死在河里是件残忍的事。

defs.def: n. 意图，目的，意向，含义 adj. 专心的，决心的，热心的

sent.orig: He's intent on moneymaking.
sent.trans: 他一心一意地赚钱。

defs.def: v. 反复，轮唱(歌曲)，用曳绳钓，搜索，滚动 n. 钓绳，钓饵 n. 巨人，巨怪

sent.orig: He trolled a song.
sent.trans: 他很欢快地唱一支歌。

defs.def: v. 假装，装作

sent.orig: I don't pretend to know as much as he does about it.
sent.trans: 我不敢说我对此事的了解有他那样多。

defs.def: adj. 光滑的(巧妙的，完全的，老一套的，第一流的) adv. 滑溜地(直接地)

sent.orig: The hurricane carried away the roof as slick as a whistle.
sent.trans: 飓风把屋顶不费吹灰之力地刮掉了。

defs.def: n. 下部构造，下部组织，基础结构，基础设施

sent.orig: Our city offer overseas in vesture fair service for production aside from infrastructure.
sent.trans: 我市除了向外国投资者提供基础设施外，还提供良好的生产服务设施。

defs.def: adj. 一流的，极好的 n. (复)nifties: 俏皮话
abbr. 细则，规格(=specification) abbr. 投机（=speculation) abbr. 特别，特别地（=special/specially)

sent.orig: I can't believe, sometimes, that granny is dead. If I close my eyes I can just see her knitting away in that armchair as large as life, with her specs half-way down her nose.
sent.trans: 有时我真不相信祖母经去世。只要我闭上眼睛，就会看她活生生地坐在一把扶椅上，眼镜挂在鼻梁上，手里织着毛线衣。

defs.def: n. 行话 vi. 说行话

sent.orig: This article's so full of jargon it's just double Dutch to me.
sent.trans: 这文章满篇术语，对我直如天书。

defs.def: adj. 可能的，潜在的 n. 潜力，潜能 n. 电位，电势

sent.orig: The most perceptive of the three, she was the first to realize the potential danger of their situation.
sent.trans: 她在他们三人中最敏感，首先意识到他们处境的潜在危险。

defs.def: n. (巴黎)罗浮宫

sent.orig: Did you get to see the Louvre while you were in Paris?
sent.trans: 你在巴黎时有机会参观罗浮宫吗?

defs.def: n. 物质，实质，内容，重要性，财产

sent.orig: The emery is a hard metallic substance.
sent.trans: 金刚砂是非常坚硬的金属物质。

defs.def: adj. 专利的，所有权的 n. 所有权，所有人

sent.orig: And often the Japanese have added proprietary engineering to improve our machines. Like all the other semiconductor firms, we are in a box.
sent.trans: 往往日本人以自创的方法改良我们的机器。就像所有其他半导体公司一样，我们也陷于困境。

defs.def: n. 入口，大门，门静脉，[计]门户 adj. 门静脉的，器官入口的

sent.orig: A shared portal from a local network into a larger information resource such as a large packet-switched information network or a mainframe computer.
sent.trans: 从一局部网到更大的信息源(例如大型包交换信息网或计算机主机)的一种共享入口。

defs.def: n. 常到的地方 vt. 常到，缠住，出没(像鬼魂一样) vi. 徘徊，出没(像鬼魂一样)

sent.orig: The ghost has been laid and will not return to haunt you again.
sent.trans: 那鬼魂已经祛除，不会再回来缠著你了。

defs.def: n. 射手座，人马座，人马宫
n. 形状，形式，定形，身材 vt. 定形，使 ... 成形，塑造

sent.orig: I'm having trouble giving shape to my ideas in this essay.
sent.trans: 我在这篇文章中表达不清自己的想法。

defs.def: n. 记号法，表示法，注释 [计算机] 记法

sent.orig: The authors wish you to read it with a pencil in your hand, for you will often be asked to make certain notations, to write answers to particular questions.
sent.trans: 作者们希望你在读这本书的时候手里要拿上一支铅笔，因为我们要求你经常做点笔记，或是将一些具体问题的答案写下来。

defs.def: n. 部份，瓣，弓形 vt. 分割

sent.orig: The waiter brought us a dish of orange segments.
sent.trans: 服务员给我们端来一盘掰开的橘子瓣。

defs.def: adj. 内部的，内地的，国内的 n. 内部，内在

sent.orig: We are fascinated by the delicate interior design of the apartment.
sent.trans: 我们被这所公寓的精致的室内装潢设计吸引。

defs.def: adj. 合理的，理性的，能推理的 n. 有理数

sent.orig: The examiners put a premium on rational argument.
sent.trans: 评委们对以理服人的论据给以高度评价。

defs.def: adj. 相同的，同一的

sent.orig: The two systems are, in effect, identical.
sent.trans: 这两种制度实际上一模一样。

defs.def: 重装，再汇编
adj. 有限的

sent.orig: Indicating or restricted to a finite number of operations involving algebra.
sent.trans: 代数运算的在代数运算中指定或限制在一个有限数的运算之内的

defs.def: v. 调查，研究 [计算机] 研究

sent.orig: I felt impelled to investigate the matter further.
sent.trans: 我觉得自己有责任对事情作进一步调查。

defs.def: 转包商，次承包商
vt. 反覆地说，反覆地做

sent.orig: The boy do not move though the teacher reiterate her command.
sent.trans: 虽然教师一再命令，但这孩子动都不动。

defs.def: n. 同意，许可 v. 同意，承诺

sent.orig: By the common consent of critics, Shakespeare is the prince of character delineators.
sent.trans: 评论家一致公认莎士比亚是刻画人物的大师。

defs.def: adj. 可调整的

sent.orig: A bar with adjustable weights at each end, lifted for sport or exercise.
sent.trans: 杠铃两端重量可调节的棒，运动或锻炼时用来举重

defs.def: vt. 存放，堆积，使沉淀 vi. 沉淀 n. 存款，定金，堆积物

sent.orig: The Nile floods the fields and deposits mud on them.
sent.trans: 尼罗河泛滥，在田野上淤积一层泥。
